Topic.Title: why yahoo finance show goog has 7 billion in debt?

Message.Msg: Because interest rates are low, and GOOG likes to keep cash handy for several reasons.

Topic.Title: why yahoo finance show goog has 7 billion in debt?

Message.Msg: goog board of directors can issue new shares if ever needs cash only 2% share issuing is 5 billion and can be done in one day. no reason to be in debt long term debt and the interest rates is what at least 5%..bank interest rate is only 2% short term loans or 1-3 bond yeild only 2% lit T-bills. why does it even have so much cash for? it doesn't need to dividends so no need to keep cash.

Topic.Title: why yahoo finance show goog has 7 billion in debt?

Message.Msg: it weird because on the financials it says long term deb and accounts payable is 10 billion? google sells intangibles like advertising so it's hard t o trace the numbers or revenues etc. or audits it's books. but debt is debt. it shows 3 billion in LONG TERM debt not short term debt.

Topic.Title: why yahoo finance show goog has 7 billion in debt?

Message.Msg: the 10 billion is the amount it has to pay it's advertising partners or affiliates. who generate the profits for them. is till don't get the 3 billion debt, it still a lot of money when they have that much cash in hand. they can get line of credit or issue new shares if they ever short in cash no need to be in debt.

Topic.Title: why yahoo finance show goog has 7 billion in debt?

Message.Msg: most corporations are paying 7% interest in corporate bonds. no such thing as 2% interest for corporations. only for daily or 1-2 bonds maybe 2% interest that is still 60 million/year in interest which isn't pocket change.
